title: CSS Fundamentals
description: Test your knowledge of CSS basics and properties

questions.text: Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to set the text color in CSS.

questions.text: How do you select an element with id 'header' in CSS?
questions.explanation: The hash symbol (#) is used to select elements by their ID in CSS.

questions.text: Which property is used to add space between the border and content of an element?
questions.explanation: The 'padding' property adds space between an element's content and its border.

questions.text: Which CSS property controls the size of the text?
questions.explanation: The 'font-size' property is used to set the size of text in CSS.

questions.text: What value of the 'display' property makes an element a block-level flex container?
questions.explanation: The 'flex' value of the display property creates a block-level flex container.
